paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the p.Val142Ile variant in the TTR gene, including penetrance data and individual records.

functional_data.summary: The p.Val142Ile variant is associated with increased rates of incident heart failure and lower overall survival.

variants.population_frequency: 0.3% – 1.6% in the general population; 1.1% to 9.8% among people of African descent.
variants.additional_notes: The variant is the most common cause of variant transthyretin amyloidosis.
key_quotes: The p.Val142Ile variant is the most common variant of the transthyretin gene with most carriers being of African descent.
The true penetrance is unknown but the p.Val142Ile variant is associated with increased rates of incident heart failure and portends a lower overall survival.

extraction_metadata.notes: Extracted data focused on the p.Val142Ile variant in the TTR gene as specified.
